kuusisto.tinysound.internal

Class Mixer

  • java.lang.Object
    • kuusisto.tinysound.internal.Mixer

  • public class Mixer
extends Object
    The Mixer class is what does the audio data mixing for the TinySound system. Mixer is an internal class of the TinySound system and should be of no real concern to the average user of TinySound.
    Author:
    Finn Kuusisto

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Mixer()
      Construct a new Mixer for TinySound system.

        public int read(byte[] data,
       int offset,
       int length)
        Read bytes from this Mixer.
        Parameters:
        data - the buffer to read the bytes into
        offset - the start index to read bytes into
